ds2.1.8:49.2_0: Yasmiṁ samaye lokuttaraṁ jhānaṁ bhāveti niyyānikaṁ apacayagāmiṁ kāmarāgabyāpādānaṁ tanubhāvāya dutiyāya bhūmiyā pattiyā …pe…
ds2.1.8:49.4_0: rūparāgaarūparāgamānauddhaccaavijjāya anavasesappahānāya catutthāya bhūmiyā pattiyā vivicceva kāmehi …pe…
ds2.1.8:49.4_1: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ,
ds2.1.8:49.6_0: Tasseva lokuttarassa kusalassa jhānassa katattā bhāvitattā vipākaṁ vivicceva kāmehi …pe…
ds2.1.8:49.6_1: paṭhamaṁ jhānaṁ upasampajja viharati dukkhapaṭipadaṁ dandhābhiññaṁ suññataṁ,
ds2.1.8:49.8_0: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
ds2.1.8:50.2_0: Yo tasmiṁ samaye phasso phusanā samphusanā samphusitattaṁ—
ds2.1.8:51.2_0: Yā tesaṁ aññātāvīnaṁ dhammānaṁ aññā paññā pajānanā vicayo pavicayo dhammavicayo sallakkhaṇā upalakkhaṇā
ds2.1.8:51.2_1: paccupalakkhaṇā paṇḍiccaṁ kosallaṁ nepuññaṁ vebhabyā cintā upaparikkhā bhūrī medhā pariṇāyikā vipassanā
ds2.1.8:51.2_2: sampajaññaṁ patodo paññā paññindriyaṁ paññābalaṁ paññāsatthaṁ paññāpāsādo paññāāloko paññāobhāso paññāpajjoto
ds2.1.8:51.2_3: paññāratanaṁ amoho dhammavicayo sammādiṭṭhi dhammavicayasambojjhaṅgo maggaṅgaṁ maggapariyāpannaṁ—
ds2.1.8:51.4_0: ye vā pana tasmiṁ samaye aññepi atthi paṭiccasamuppannā arūpino dhammā—
